name: Terrinha
description:
Terrinha is a lil game about a bun trying to craft and plant stuff on a tiny, circular world. grow carrots and try not to get attacked by a spider or something and please don't eat meat, come on, you're a bun. also time shifts as you go around the world, woo

it was made in 72 hours for ludum dare #38 and it's kinda like a bunch of other entries i guess. i mean at least the tiny and circular bit. features polar coordinates and also mechanics already seen on earlier crafting games.

this game was made by our game dev group, opode games, which consists of:

  • caillard (drew lots of stuff)
  • gio (vxdeed) (drew nice icons)
  • raphaelgoulart (made cute sfx and bgm)
  • unphook (coded and also drew a bun)

relevant links:

  • ld#38 page
  • public repo with source code (unity, c#, mit license)
  • original soundtrack (consists of one track only but. well)
